Title: A Last Hope
Description:
A whole brood of whelplings, lost...

<Sendrax straightens her back and sticks her chin up.>

There is one more location we have not checked yet. The large ritual site where that proto-dragon dropped off the eggs.

Let us charge their cruel defenses together, $n, and save what we can.
ObjectivesText: Rescue the last Infused Dragon Egg.

Objectives.Text: Meet Sendrax by the ritual site
Pick up the Infused Dragon Egg
